name: Creaibo
tagline: Create 10x better content that sounds like you, faster
description: Creaibo is an AI-native integrated creation space that supports entire workflowâ€”from initial idea and structured framing to ready-to-use content. Built for original content creators who refuse generic, robotic output, it helps you preserve and scale your unique creativity. Creaibo solves a core problem: significantly boosts creative efficiency and content quality, while maintaining consistent styleâ€”no matter the format, be it blogs, long/short video, or any visual-text posts.

name: Foundire
description: Stop repeating the same first-round interviews for hiring teams. Foundire helps teams scale hiring with global talent search, resume scoring, and adaptive AI interviews that generate decision-ready scorecards with transcripts. In live interviews, the interview copilot gives real-time prompts, follow-up suggestions, and structured notes â€” all connected in one workflow from sourcing to offers and background checks.

name: wink-cursor

It's a tiny React component that replaces your cursor with a playful emoji that winks when users click ğŸ˜‰ âœ¨ Why ? Most apps feel serious & transactional. name: Imajourn
tagline: We are now on the Apple App Store with multiple new features
description: Imajourn is an interactive simulation sandbox that brings the physics of waves and sound to life. Whether you are an artist, a physics enthusiast, or a meditator, Imajourn offers a mesmerizing playground of light, motion, and geometry. Imajourn has moved from its early open source webapp version (Numatics) to a fully functional App Store app with new name and branding, and many new features: Interactive wave sim, chladni patterns and cymatics, audio reactivity, 3D particle sim, presets and more!

name: Vidcard
tagline: The World's First Video Business Cardâ€”Be Unforgettable
description: Inspired by the "Atlas" card from Call of Duty, Vidcard is the world's first business card. The Problem: Paper cards get ignored. The Solution: Vidcard plays your video pitch instantlyâ€”grabbing 100% of attention. Combined with NFC, it tracks exactly who views your profile and what they look at (Data Feedback). ğŸš€ Specs: HD Video Player, Wireless Charging, NFC Tracking,ultra-thin (<5mm).

name: Trip Replay
tagline: Turn your travels into stunning videos
description: Create beautiful animated travel videos for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts. Visualize your journeys with cinematic map animations. Free, private, and no sign-up required.

name: Inspiration by Mind Dock
tagline: Live AI trends from HuggingFace, ArXiv, GitHub, and more
description: Explore AI like never before! AI Data Map integrates models, news, research, and trends, delivering inspiration directly to you.

name: Running Form Analysis App
tagline: Upload a short side-view clip, get actionable form feedback
description: StrideIQ help runners sanity-check their form from a short side-view video. Upload a 10â€“20s clip and it highlights a few common issues Itâ€™s meant to be a quick â€œis this roughly what I think it is?â€ tool â€” not a replacement for a coach. Works best with a steady, side-view clip at an easy-to-tempo pace. Privacy note: the current version runs in the browser; your video stays on your device. Try it here: https://fruitfoxlu.github.io/StrideIQ/?lang=en

name: Finbos
description: Finbos is your intelligent financial advisor that helps you take complete control of your money. Track income and expenses, calculate and manage loans, monitor your net worth, set and achieve financial goals, and receive AI-powered insights for smarter decisions. Build lasting wealth with personalized frugality alerts and comprehensive business planning tools.
